The latest weather & Yongsan services information updates: 
As Typhoon Soulik downgraded significantly into a Tropical Storm, TCCOR level is all clear. All non-essential personnel are recalled NLT 1200, 24 Aug. Nearly all services resume operations NLT 1300.

Today: 24 Aug, some flights are affected  by typhoon. Situation may  subject to change depending on the route and strength of the typhoon. Please check our website for latest updates.
